description.title: What do I do?
description.intro: I am a Full-Stack software developer currently focussing on frontend development. I am very passionate about frontend architecture and building enterprise-level web applications. I always strive to learn new technologies and keep up with the latest trends.
description.bachelor: I have a Bachelor of Science in
